debet_account_id.description: When the debit side only includes a payment account (e.g., a bank account), its ID can be set in this shortcut field. In this case `debet_etries` must be set blank.

debet_entries.description: List of debit entries associated with this blueprint. If debet_account_id is set, this field must be empty.

credit_account_id.description: When the credit side only includes a payment account (e.g., a bank account), its ID can be set in this shortcut field. In this case `credit_entries` must be set blank.

credit_entries.description: List of credit entries associated with this blueprint. If credit_account_id is set, this field must be empty.

expense_entries.description: In case of sales, any expenses that are not directly related to the sale can be recorded here. This is useful for recording costs that are not directly linked to a specific sale, such as overhead costs.
